# Drone News 48h Brief — February 15, 2026

_Window: last 48 hours; 41 incidents._

## Summary
In the last 48 hours, various drone incidents have been noted, revealing significant themes in smuggling, terrorism, and interference. Notably, several cases of drone smuggling were reported, particularly around borders and jails, with interceptions of weapons and drugs by authorities. Notable police operations using drones led to multiple arrests related to heroin smuggling. Additionally, incidents involving drone terrorism were highlighted, including strikes that resulted in casualties in conflict zones. The emergence of new drone regulations in the UK and counter-drone technologies denote evolving policies in aviation safety and national security. Interference with airspace, including airport disruptions, remains a pressing concern due to unauthorized drone activity near sensitive areas.

**By category:** airport: 3 • arrest: 1 • crash: 1 • interference: 1 • other: 24 • smuggling: 10 • terrorism: 1
**Top queries:** drone smuggling (10), drone terrorism (10), drone incident (7), drone arrest (4), drone prison (3)
